Karachi Marathon 2025

The Karachi Marathon, organized by Seaview Running Club, stands as Pakistan's premier racing event, The Karachi Marathon isn't just an ordinary race; it's a grand celebration with the colors of City of Lights. With its World Athletics certification, it's a beacon for athletes aspiring to international acclaim, offering a gateway to coveted six-star races, as the only race in Pakistan to offer qualification for the prestigious Abbott World Major Marathons. From the seasoned athlete to the first-time participant, the Karachi Marathon welcomes all. It's more than just a race; it's a testament to Karachi's resilience, a showcase of its diversity. Scheduled for January 2025 Seaview Karachi, stands ready to host this monumental event, a stage set for greatness, where dreams will be chased and victories savored. ‚Äã
